overview: Sweetheart Video's celebrated showcase series presents Jessie Andrews, in four unique scenes with four of her favorite girls. Jessie enjoys a crazy car ride with sassy Dana DeArmond, an intense make out session with Carter Cruise (who delayed her vacation just so she could do this scene with Jessie), a romantic garden romp with Jodi Taylor, and finally--a hard, dirty poolside squirt shower with Bonnie Rotten. Jessie loves these girls, and it shows!
title: Jessie Loves Girls
